changeSet.sql:
create sequence employee_SEQ start with 1 increment by 50;
create table employee ( id bigint not null, birthday date not null, cellphone varchar(255) not null, email varchar(255) not null, externalId uuid not null, firstname varchar(255) not null, gender varchar(20) check (gender in ('MALE','FEMALE')), lastname varchar(255) not null, primary key (id) );
